title: Pulitzer-Winning Reporter Finds A Better Life In PR
teaser: Rob Kuznia was one of three journalists at an LA paper to win a 2014 Pulitzer Prize. But days after he finished the winning project, he quit journalism altogether. Kuznia tells NPR's Scott Simon why.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
